name: Lover's Lane
description:
Set in the world of The Shrouded Isle (Kitfox Games), Lover's Lane is a short narrative experience that features two teen cultists sharing four seasons of love instead of worshiping the ascension of their elder god, Chernobog.

Disclaimer: This game is free and fan made, using assets graciously provided by Kitfox Games, from their Lovecraftian inspired cult manager The Shrouded Isle. Please support their game.
